com.here.android.mpa.venues3d

Interface VenueMapFragment.VenueListener

  • Enclosing class:
    VenueMapFragment

    public static interface VenueMapFragment.VenueListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFloorChanged(Venue venue, Level oldLevel, Level newLevel)
      This callback method is triggered when a floor is changed.
      void onSpaceDeselected(Venue venue, Space space)
      This callback method is triggered when a space is deselected.
      void onSpaceSelected(Venue venue, Space space)
      This callback method is triggered when a space is tapped.

      This callback method is triggered when a venue is deselected.

      This callback method is triggered when a venue is selected.

      This callback method is triggered when a venue is tapped.
      void onVenueVisibleInViewport(Venue venue, boolean visible)
      This callback method is triggered when a venue becomes visible to triggering area, or when a venue disappears from the triggering area.

    • Method Detail

      • onVenueTapped

        void onVenueTapped(Venue venue,
                   float x,
                   float y)
        This callback method is triggered when a venue is tapped.
        Parameters:
        venue - The tapped Venue.
        x - The x screen position on the tapped point.
        y - The y screen position on the tapped point.

      • onVenueSelected

        void onVenueSelected(Venue venue)
        This callback method is triggered when a venue is selected.
        Parameters:
        venue - The selected Venue.

      • onVenueDeselected

        void onVenueDeselected(Venue venue,
                       DeselectionSource source)
        This callback method is triggered when a venue is deselected.
        Parameters:
        venue - The deselected Venue.
        source - The source which has called deselection of the venue.

      • onSpaceSelected

        void onSpaceSelected(Venue venue,
                     Space space)
        This callback method is triggered when a space is tapped.
        Parameters:
        venue - The Venue with selected space.
        space - The selected Space.

      • onSpaceDeselected

        void onSpaceDeselected(Venue venue,
                       Space space)
        This callback method is triggered when a space is deselected.
        Parameters:
        venue - The Venue with deselected space.
        space - The deselected Space.

      • onFloorChanged

        void onFloorChanged(Venue venue,
                    Level oldLevel,
                    Level newLevel)
        This callback method is triggered when a floor is changed.
        Parameters:
        venue - The Venue where the floor is changed.
        oldLevel - The previously selected Level.
        newLevel - The currently selected Level.

      • onVenueVisibleInViewport

        void onVenueVisibleInViewport(Venue venue,
                              boolean visible)
        This callback method is triggered when a venue becomes visible to triggering area, or when a venue disappears from the triggering area. The triggering area is centered to the viewport. The width of the triggering area is * 2/3 of the screen width and its height is the same as the width.
        Parameters:
        venue - The Venue object or null if there are no visible venues nearby.
        visible - A flag indicating if the venue is visible or not.
